dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3935 IH: Bolstering Organizations and Options to Support Training in Primary Care Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Shimkus (for himself and Mr. Long) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To provide for an extension of funding for the National Health Service Corps.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bolstering Organizations and Options to Support Training in Primary Care Act or the BOOST Primary Care Act.

section.header: Extension for National Health Service Corps
section.text: Section 10503(b)(2)(E) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 254bâ€“2(b)(2)(E)) is amended by striking 2017 and inserting 2019.
